subject: Hockey, Ice
Computers and the Internet
lead_paragraph: When Chris Dey joined the Islanders in May, he set a number of goals for the organization, one of which, he said, “was to create the best Web site in all of professional sports.”
snippet: When Chris Dey joined the Islanders in May, he set a number of goals for the organization, one of which, he said, “was to create the best Web site in all of professional sports.”
